price: A ako te htjednu prevariti – pa tebi je, doista, dovoljan Allah, On te podržava Svojom pomoći i vjernicima,
arabic: وَإِن يُرِيدُوٓاْ أَن يَخۡدَعُوكَ فَإِنَّ حَسۡبَكَ ٱللَّهُۚ هُوَ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَيَّدَكَ بِنَصۡرِهِۦ وَبِٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-in yurīdū an yakhdaʿūka fa-inna ḥasbaka al-lahu huwa alladhī ayyadaka binaṣrihi wabil-mu'minīna
